tool_description: This API returns candlestick charts images (base64) so you can use them wherever you want!
title: Candlestick Chart

api_list.name: Binance charts
api_list.description: This endpoint creates candlestick charts for any cryptocurrency listed on [Binance](https://www.binance.com) that you want!

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description:
Symbol for the traiding pair

You can see every traiding pair available [here](https://coinmarketcap.com/en/exchanges/binance)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description:
Amount of candles in the chart

- Default: 16
- Type: Integer. Maximum 1000

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description:
Time interval for each candle.

- Default: 1m

## Time intervals
- m: Minutes
- h: Hours
- d: Days
- w: Weeks
- M: Months

List of intervals:
- 1m
- 3m
- 5m
- 15m
- 30m
- 1h
- 2h
- 4h
- 6h
- 8h
- 12h
- 1d
- 3d
- 1w
- 1M

parameters.name: lastPrice
parameters.description:
The last price that the chart must have. This could be useful if there is some delay between your analysis and the call to this API, and that delay could make a difference between the numbers and the chart. If not given, the chart will be created with Binance last price

- Type: Number

utterances.utterance: Generate a candlestick chart for the ETHUSDT trading pair.
Create a candlestick chart for BTCUSDT with a 5-minute interval.
I need a candlestick chart for the XRPUSDT pair with 50 candles.
Show me a candlestick chart for the ADAUSDT trading pair with a 1-hour interval.
Get a candlestick chart for the BNBUSDT pair with the last price set to 300.
Provide a candlestick chart for the DOTUSDT pair with a 1-day interval.
I want a candlestick chart for the LTCUSDT trading pair with 100 candles.
Create a candlestick chart for the LINKUSDT pair with a 15-minute interval.
Generate a candlestick chart for the SOLUSDT pair with the last price set to 150.
Show me a candlestick chart for the UNIUSDT trading pair with a 4-hour interval.

api_list.name: Health
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://candlestick-chart.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "candlestick-chart.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
